abstract: All-Star NHL center Daniel Briere announces his retirement.
lead_paragraph: Briere, an undersize center who went on to become an N.H.L. All-Star and played a key role in the Flyers’ run to the 2010 Stanley Cup finals, has retired.
snippet: Briere, an undersize center who went on to become an N.H.L. All-Star and played a key role in the Flyers’ run to the 2010 Stanley Cup finals, has retired.
